Posts.Content: Feb 25, 2009 03:55PM liz19 wrote: Hello Girls, I got my port out this morning, it went great , i was nervous at first but the nurses assured me that everything would be ok and that it would go fast, after my IV was put on they gave me some meds and it relaxed me after that they gave me something that put me to sleep and when i wake up it was over  , i went to recovery about 30 min then i went home !!! i am so glad it is out , i am feeling a little sore right now , i took motrin for pain , i am glad i found  this discussion board it has helped me out alot!!! good luck ladies take care , have a great hump day!!                                                                                      liz19
